actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the heirs of Master Sergeant Nathaniel Scott, United States Army, retired, deceased.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay specified sums to named heirs of a deceased member of the U.S. Army in full satisfaction of their claims against the United States for the unpaid balance of military retired pay.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the heirs of Master Sergeant Nathaniel Scott, United States Army, retired, deceased.
